abstract: Jonathan Rey Bornstein (born November 7, 1984, in Torrance, California) is an American soccer player who currently plays for Atlante of the Liga MX on loan from Tigres UANL.
comment: Jonathan Rey Bornstein (born November 7, 1984, in Torrance, California) is an American soccer player who currently plays for Atlante of the Liga MX on loan from Tigres UANL.
